activities: This certification covers personal data transferred from the EU regarding EU employees, customers, suppliers and vendors for various purposes including employee benefits, human resources management, sales and marketing activities, and supply chain management not processed under a separate derogation including, but not limited to consent, contract, etc.

recoursemech: Eastman Kodak Company participates in the Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor Program for online, offline and manual customer, supplier and vendor data.
